name: Alchemistress Vivi
summary: Alchemistress Vivi is a code-breaking logic puzzle that should take approximately 20 to 25 minutes to complete. In each level, up to 6 magic items must be arranged in a certain order to cast powerful spells. Every try results in a feedback that helps the player to eventually find the right sequence. But watch out: There's only a limited number of lives available for this.
